title: Royals All Star Voting Echoes Last Time MLB Fans Stuffed The Ballot Box
teaser: Eight Royals could start in the All Star game July 14. NPR's Robert Siegel talks to Chris Eckes, curator of the Cincinnati Reds Hall of Fame and Museum, about the last time this happened.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
